trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents an SQL statement that is executed while connected to a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xx XXX xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the text command to run against the data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx $xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is 30 seconds.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx 00 xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The property value assigned is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection to the data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx XXX xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the transaction within which the Command object of a .NET Framework data provider executes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx xx x .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

the Command object of a .NET Framework data provider executes.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx xx x .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is null.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An IDbDataParameter object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx $xxxxxx$XXxXxxxXxxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Executes an SQL statement against the Connection object of a .NET Framework data provider, and returns the number of rows affected.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xx XXX xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx xx x .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of rows affected.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The connection does not exist.

-or-

The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the resultset returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Extra columns or rows are ignored.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The first column of the first row in the resultset.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx $xx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
